pkgmetadata.longdescription: psyced is a multi-protocol chat and messaging daemon that federates over XMPP and PSYC while accepting IRC, PSYC and XMPP clients. Compared to regular IRC servers it comes with programmable channels which make bots unnecessary, it comes with authenticated users and persistency of conversations, making IRC services and bouncers unnecessary. By disallowing the /mode feature of IRC it reduces the risk of channel warfare. It also provides a built-in HTTP server and many other experimental features such as NNTP, RSS, WAP.
